item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Smashing Pumpkins - Zeitgeist (retailer exclusive versions) in FLAC/any lossless
item.description:
This could be a difficult one, but if anyone has the Best Buy reissue version of Zeitgeist with the 3 bonus tracks (Death from Above, Stellar, Ma Belle) and the Target version with the bonus track Zeitgeist, I would be so grateful.

Also if anyone has Billy Corgan's solo album The Future Embrace that would be cool too.

Thanks!
item.author: obfuscator
